wikipedia_page.main: Elmslie William Dallas FRSE (1809–1879) was a British artist, teacher and photographer.

response: Fosdick's first serious work Malmiztic, the Toltec; and the Cavaliers of the Cross, published in 1851, drew its inspiration from his travels in Mexico over the late 1840s. In 1855, he published a compilation of poems entitled Ariel, and other Poems with illustrations from designs by Elmslie William Dallas.
